titleStmt.title: Archæologiæ Græcæ, or, The antiquities of Greece by John Potter ...
titleStmt.author: Potter, John, 1673 or 4-1747.

notesStmt.note: Cover title for both volumes, not mentioned in Wing, precedes the title page of vol. 1.

Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
